name: BlockCombers
description:
~BLOCKCOMBERS~

Help Cinch the Crab keep the beaches of Sunset City clean!

Clear the blocks by pushing them together to form lines and score points!

Share your highest score in the comments!

~ Controls ~
  • Use the [left/right arrows] to walk left and right
  • Press the [up arrow] to jump
  • You can push blocks by continuously walking in to them
  • The more blocks you're trying to push, the long it will take to move them
  • If you form a solid row of blocks, they'll disappear and you'll score a point
  • You'll die if you get crushed!
~ About ~

BlockCombers was made as part of the A Game By Its Cover 2021 jam, based on the entries for the My Famicase Exhibition.

The entry that I chose was Puzzle by Jaime Ugarte (twitter: @haimeh_ugarte). Except for creating the inspirational original cartridge image, Jaime wasn't involved with the creation of this game (so don't blame them for any bugs!)
